Welcome to EpicServer!

This is a static website served by EpicServer. The server is configured to serve all files from the static directory under the /site URL path.

You can add more HTML files, CSS, JavaScript, images, and other assets to this directory to build your static website.

Features

  • Simple static file serving at /site/
  • Health check endpoint at /health
  • API status endpoint at /api/status
  • API info endpoint at /api/info
  • Development environment with logging
